title: Zoned Out: Examining the Impact of Exclusionary Zoning on People, Resources, and Opportunity
Waters Announces Updates to October Hearing Schedule
summary: Today, Congresswoman Maxine Waters (D-CA), Chairwoman of the House Committee on Financial Services, announced the following updates to the hearing schedule for the month of October: POSTPONED: October 20 at 10:00 AM ET: The full Committee will convene for a hybrid hearing entitled, “The State of the International Financial System and U.S. Participation in the International Financial Institutions.”...

title: Waters on Zoning Reform: We Must Ensure Every Family in America Has Access to the Communities of Their Choice
